definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc
pork strips stir-fried with yuxiang 魚香|鱼香[yu2 xiang1]

sentences.english: The dish that he cooks best is tender ginger stir fried with meat slices.
sentences.chinese: 他最拿手的一道菜就是子姜炒肉丝。

sentences.english: It looks very like the noodles with shredded pork of my hometown.
sentences.chinese: 看起来很像我家乡的肉丝面。

sentences.english: The chicken satay has got a really unique flavor. What'd you use?
sentences.chinese: 这沙茶鸡肉丝的味道真的很独特你加了什么？

sentences.english: The technics of producing sauce for shallot meat silk fried noodle was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了香葱肉丝快炒面调料包的制作工艺及食用方法。

sentences.english: Have sailed the seven seas water, fish-flavored pork with chicken drumstick.
sentences.chinese: 曾经沧海难为水，鱼香肉丝配鸡腿。

sentences.english: Some of the famous dishes are pork shreds with fish seasoning, chicken cubes with chili peppers, and spicy braised crucian carp.
sentences.chinese: 一些著名的菜肴如鱼香肉丝，辣子鸡丁，干烧鲫鱼。

sentences.english: Kung Pow chicken, Yuxiang shredded pork and tomatoes fried with egg.
sentences.chinese: 宫保鸡丁，鱼香肉丝还有西红柿炒鸡蛋。

sentences.english: She likes Yuxiangrousi. She like cholocate too.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢吃鱼香肉丝，还喜欢吃巧克力。

sentences.english: Beijing Sauce is a traditional Beijing style cuisine wire.
sentences.chinese: 京酱肉丝是传统北京风味菜。

definition: pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
